body.text:
Dear Richard,



Good Evening!



We would like to inform you that we can offer Sorbitan Palmitate.



Kindly find the below offer,



Product            : Sorbitan Palmitate

Price                 : USD 2200/MT FOB India Port

: USD 2320/MT CIF Charleston 20ft

: USD 2330/MT CIF Charleston 40ft



Packing            : Open head drums

Lead Time        : 3-4 weeks after receiving the confirmed order

Offer validity    : Subject to reconfirmation at the time of order placement

Rest of terms remain same.



Looking forward to your confirmation on above shared price.



*

Please review the attached specification, share if you can meet these
specifications and then pricing in Open head drums.



Thanks



Richard
